item.title: Gisselle add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "When we love, we always strive to become better than we are. When we strive to become better than we are, everything around us becomes better too." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Gisselle add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "What's the world's greatest lie?... It's this: that at a certain point in our lives, we lose control of what's happening to us, and our lives become controlled by fate." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Gisselle add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "You are what you believe yourself to be." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Gisselle add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "Now that she had nothing to lose, she was free." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Gisselle add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "I can choose either to be a victim of the world or an adventurer in search of treasure. It's all a question of how I view my life." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Gisselle add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "Nothing in the world is ever completely wrong. Even a stopped clock is right twice a day." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Gisselle add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "And, when you want something, all the universe conspires in helping you to achieve it." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Gisselle add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "There is only one thing that makes a dream impossible to achieve: the fear of failure." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Gisselle add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "Everything tells me that I am about to make a wrong decision, but making mistakes is just part of life. What does the world want of me? Does it want me to take no risks, to go back to where I came from because I didn't have the courage to say "yes" to life?" -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Gisselle add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "When I had nothing to lose, I had everything. When I stopped being who I am, I found myself." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Gisselle add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "The secret of life, though, is to fall seven times and to get up eight times." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Gisselle add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "A child can teach an adult three things: to be happy for no reason, to always be busy with something, and to know how to demand with all his might that which he desires." -- Paulo Coelho
